text_preprocessing_utilities module

text_preprocessing_utilities.get_lowercase_words_from_str(val)[source]
text_preprocessing_utilities.get_rare_tokens(dict_of_freq, threshold)[source]
text_preprocessing_utilities.get_spacy_tokens_from_raw_text(text, nlp_model)[source]

Convert a raw text to a built-in python list of spacy.tokens.token.Token object (tokens);

Parameters:

  • text – the input text; it’s a native python string

  • nlp_model – NLP model that is used to preprocess the text; it’s a spacy.lang object

Returns:

list of words extracted from the input text

Return type:

built-in python list

Decide what to do with numerical values (keep them or remove them)

Parameters:

  • method –

text_preprocessing_utilities.lemmatize_spacy_tokens(tokens)[source]

Apply lemmatization for a list of words.

Parameters:

tokens – the input list with words; every element is a spacy.tokens.token.Token object

Returns:

a list constructed from the initial one but every with is lemmatized (converted to base form)

Return type:

built-in python list, every element is a spacy.tokens.token.Token object

text_preprocessing_utilities.remove_excessive_space(text)[source]

Remove excessive white spaces like “ “,

, from the beginning and ending of text

:param text - input text; it’s a native python string :return: the given text without spaces; :rtype: built-in python string

text_preprocessing_utilities.remove_spacy_punctuations(tokens)[source]

Remove all the punctuations from the given text

Parameters:

tokens – the input list that contains all the words and punctuations

Returns:

a list with all words, without punctuations;

Return type:

built-in python list

text_preprocessing_utilities.remove_spacy_stopwords(tokens)[source]

Remove all the stop words from the given text

Parameters:

tokens – the input list that contains all the words

Returns:

the given list, without stop words;

Return type:

built-in python list
